rules.natural: Provided that a facility has proprietary data, then the publication is not open access.
If a publication has high impact, then it is in a prestigious journal.
Whenever a publication is widely cited, it follows that it has high impact.
Under the condition that an organization publishes a preprint of a publication, that organization publishes the publication.
If an organization is in a legal dispute with a facility, then a settlement is reached between the organization and the facility.
Either an organization engages in mediation with a facility, or if an organization is in a legal dispute with a facility, then it is not the case that a settlement is reached between them.
Provided that a facility conducts research leading to a publication, then the publication is peer-reviewed.
Either a facility conducts research leading to a publication, or an organization provides grant funding to a facility.
If a publication is peer-reviewed, then the publication is retracted.
If a publication is cited, then the publication is not retracted.
Either a publication is open access, or if a publication is peer-reviewed, then the publication is cited.
